summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6049 for the improvement of West Fulton Street from 39th Avenue West to the alley east thereof; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 82280, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
